fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Swap the deaths of two players (Alive)
- Swap two players' roles (Dead)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will swap all attacks, both direct and indirect, from one player to the other
- Swapping roles lasts until the end of the following night, but does not swap goals or win conditions
- You may not swap two player's role until the previous swap is done
